name: GIANT HYENA

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Rampage (1/Day)
bonus_actions.text: Immediately after dealing damage to a creature that was already Bloodied, the hyena can move up to half its Speed, and it makes one Bite attack.

raw_text:
AC 12 	Initiative +2 (12)
HP 45 (6d10 + 12)
Speed 50 ft.
Large Beast, Unaligned
